mapper.select: SELECT USERCODE,COMMUNITYTB.COMMUNITYBNO AS COMMUNITYBNO,COMMUNITYTB.EMAIL AS EMAIL,COMMENT, NICKNAME, COMMUNITYIMGTB.REALFILENAME AS REALFILENAME,COMMUNITYIMGTB.REALPATH AS REALPATH,PRIVATE AS PRIVATEOR, (select count(communitybno) from replytb where replytb.communitybno=communitytb.communitybno)as rownum, (select count(communitybno) from like_badoomtb where communitytb.communitybno=like_badoomtb.communitybno and like_badoomcode='badoom') as badoomnum, (select count(like_badoomtb.email) from like_badoomtb where communitytb.communitybno=like_badoomtb.communitybno and like_badoomtb.email=#{email} and like_badoomcode='badoom') as badoom, (select count(communitybno) from like_badoomtb where communitytb.communitybno=like_badoomtb.communitybno and like_badoomcode='like') as likenum, (select count(like_badoomtb.email) from like_badoomtb where communitytb.communitybno=like_badoomtb.communitybno and like_badoomtb.email=#{email} and like_badoomcode='like')as likee FROM COMMUNITYTB JOIN NICKNAMETB,COMMUNITYIMGTB WHERE PRIVATE='N' AND COMMUNITYTB.EMAIL=NICKNAMETB.EMAIL AND COMMUNITYTB.COMMUNITYBNO=COMMUNITYIMGTB.COMMUNITYBNO and (nickname like #{keyword} or comment like #{keyword})

SELECT contact,enterprisedetailtb.licensenumber as licensenumber,address,weekend,weekday,domain,storename,parking,cp_entnum ,private,frontimg,realpath, (select count(licensenumber) from replytb where replytb.licensenumber=ENTERPRISEDETAILTB.licensenumber)as rownum, (select count(licensenumber) from like_badoomtb where ENTERPRISEDETAILTB.licensenumber=like_badoomtb.licensenumber and like_badoomcode='badoom') as badoomnum, (select count(like_badoomtb.email) from like_badoomtb where ENTERPRISEDETAILTB.licensenumber=like_badoomtb.licensenumber and like_badoomtb.email='' and like_badoomcode='badoom') as badoom, (select count(licensenumber) from like_badoomtb where ENTERPRISEDETAILTB .licensenumber=like_badoomtb.licensenumber and like_badoomcode='like') as likenum, (select count(like_badoomtb.email) from like_badoomtb where ENTERPRISEDETAILTB .licensenumber=like_badoomtb.licensenumber and like_badoomtb.email='' and like_badoomcode='like')as likee FROM ENTERPRISEDETAILTB , ENTIMGTB , CATEGORYTB where ENTERPRISEDETAILTB.LICENSENUMBER=CATEGORYTB.LICENSENUMBER AND ENTIMGTB.LICENSENUMBER=ENTERPRISEDETAILTB.LICENSENUMBER AND ENTERPRISEDETAILTB.PRIVATE='N' and ADDRESS LIKE '경기도 성남시%' group by contact,enterprisedetailtb.licensenumber ,address,weekend,weekday,domain,storename,parking,cp_entnum ,private,frontimg,realpath
